name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-nutrient-document-viewer
title: Nutrient Document Viewer
shortDescription: This a custom PDF viewer web part for SharePoint Online by integrating Nutrient for Web using the SharePoint Framework (SPFx).
longDescription: This a custom PDF viewer web part for SharePoint Online by integrating Nutrient for Web using the SharePoint Framework (SPFx).

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
